data.name: Moist Diane Extra Damage Repair Shampoo 450ml
data.short_description: The Amino Keratin nourishes from deep within and works to repair hair damaged from perms and colorings. Our new Sensor Technology targets high concern areas instantly, restoring gaps and holes on hair surfaces to produce smooth, even hair. Essential nutrients in Beauty Keratin boost your hair’s vitality and overall health.
data.description:
Repairs Damage Hair


Fills in the holes and gaps on the surface of the hair Deep-conditioning hair treatment 

Recommended if you: 

Have dyed or permed hair 
Desire manageable hair from roots to the end 

Silicone Free / Sulfate-Free 
 



Ingredients


 Water, sodium olefin (C14-16) sulfonate, cocamidopropyl betaine, cocamidomethyl MEA, cocoyl glutamate TEA, cocoyl hydrolyzed keratin K (wool), PEG-7 glyceryl cocoate, myristamine oxide, sodium cocoamphoacetate, cocoyl Methyl taurine Na, γ-docosalactone, quaternium-18, quaternium-33, cholesterol, ceramide EOP, ceramide NG, ceramide NP, ceramide AG, ceramide AP, PG, hydrolyzed keratin (wool/feather), Argania spinosa kernel oil , Mango Seed Oil, Theobroma Grandiflorum Seed Oil, Prune Seed Extract, Carapaguaianensis Seed Oil, Sclerocaria Bilea Seed Oil, Baobab Seed Oil, Opuntia Ficus Indica Seed Oil, Steardimonium Hydroxypropyl Hydrolyzate Keratin, Pouteria sapota seed oil, keratin (wool), isostearoyl hydrolyzed keratin (wool), alanine, hydroxyproline, PCA-Na, cetearamidethyldiethonium hydrolyzed rice protein, sodium hyaluronate, hydroxypropyltrimonium hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed hyaluronic acid, hydrolyzed honey protein, apple fruit culture cell extract, argania spinosa blast extract, rhododendron ferrugineum leaf culture cell extract, collagen, hydrolyzed conchiolin, bisethoxydicyclohexane-1,4-dicarboxylate Glycol, propanediol, DPG, BG, isomalt, polyquaternium-10, isononyl isononanoate, soybean sterol, sodium chloride, xanthan gum, lecithin, behentrimonium chloride, glycerin, citric acid, lactic acid, tocopherol, EDTA-2Na, sodium benzoate , phenoxyethanol, fragrance, caramel
data.guide:
How to Use:


1. Gently wash away dirt and oil from the scalp with lukewarm water. 

2. Dispense shampoo on the palm and use your fingertips to massage the scalp in a small circular motion from above the ears. 

3. Cover your entire scalp with the foaming lather and leave it on for a few minutes. The rich, bouncy foam absorbs dirt and oil from the scalp for a soothing and refreshing cleanse.
data.only_tags: Diane,shampoo,damaged hair,chemically treated hair,rough hair,frizzy hair,hair breakage,dirty scalp
data.meta_title: Moist Diane Extra Damage Repair Shampoo 450ml
data.meta_description:
Repairs Damage Hair
Fills in the holes and gaps on the surface of the hair Deep-conditioning hair treatment

Recommended if you:

Have dyed or permed hair
Desire manageable hair from roots to the end

Silicone Free / Sulfate-Free
Key Ingredients
Amino Keratin
Repairs damaged hair from the inside out. When amino acids are insufficiently supplied to the cells of the hair follicles, cuticles are prone to breakage and split ends

Organic Argan Oil
This organic oil penetrates deeply into the roots. Cactus and Mango Oil works to smooth the surface of the hair.
How to Use
1. Gently wash away dirt and oil from the scalp with lukewarm water.
2. Dispense shampoo on the palm and use your fingertips to massage the scalp in a small circular motion from above the ears.
3. Cover your entire scalp with the foaming lather and leave it on for a few minutes. The rich, bouncy foam absorbs dirt and oil from the scalp for a soothing and refreshing cleanse.
Ingredients
Water, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Cocamide Methyl MEA, Tea-Cocoyl Glutamate, Steardimonium Hydroxypropyl Hydrolyzed Keratin, Propanediol, Gamma-Docosalactone, Quaternium-33, Dipropylene Glycol, Butylene Glycol, Alanine, Hydroxyproline, Hydrolyzed Honey Protein, Sodium PCA, Keratin, Hydrolyzed Conchiolin Protein, Prunus Domestica Seed Extract, Malus Domestica Fruit Cell Culture Extract, Collagen, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Rhododendron Ferrugineum Leaf Cell Culture Extract,



Ceramide AP Or Ceramide 6 II, Isomalt, Polyquaternium-10, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Cetearamidoethyl Diethonium Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Isonomy Lisononanoate, Isostearoyl Hydrolyzed Keratin, Pouteria Sapota Seed Oil, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Theobroma Grandiflorum Seed Butter, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Sterols, Ceramide NG or Ceramide 2, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Ceramide AG Or Ceramide 5, Ceramide NP Or Ceramide 3, Ceramide EOP Or Ceramide 1, Bis-Ethoxydiglycol Cyclohexane 1,4-Dicarboxylate, Carapa Guaianensis Seed Oil, Adansonia Digitata Seed Oil, Opuntia Ficus-India Seed Oil, Sodium Chloride, Argania Spinosa Sprout Cell Extract, Cholesterol, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Cocoamphoacetate, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Myristamine Oxide, Potassium Cocoyl Hydrolyzed Keratin, Lecithin, Quaternium-18, Behentrimonium Chloride, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Citric Acid, Lactic Acid, Tocpherol, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance, Caramel
data.meta_tags: Diane,shampoo,damaged hair,chemically treated hair,rough hair,frizzy hair,hair breakage,dirty scalp

data.name: Cow brand Skin Life Facial Cleansing Foam Medicated Acne Care 130g
data.short_description:
Skin Type: Acne-prone skin

  • Skin Concerns: Acne
  • Gender: Unisex

Designed for acne-prone skin, this medicated cleansing foam uses an oil-free formula to exfoliate, soothe and replenish skin. Boasts a floral and fruity scent.

  • With plenty of creamy foam, tightly off the acne.
  • Give skin moist and refreshing with luscious moisture, prepare the texture on the unobtrusive skin of the pores.
  • Flexible extra horny around the pores, prepare to smooth skin.
  • Oil free, noncomedogenic genetic tested.
  • Scent of citrus floral.
  • Efficacy effect:
  • Cleanse extra sebum and clean pores.
  • Firmly sterilize up to the acne of the back of the pores, to prevent acne.
data.description:
Category: Cosmetics/Skin care/ Face wash 
 

  • Brand Name: Cow
  • Company: COW BRAND SOAP KYOSHINSHA CO., LTD
  • Origin of the Country: Japan
  • Weight: 130 gm


Ingredients 


Myristic acid, lauric acid, stearic acid,Isopropyl methylphenol, 2K glycyrrhizinate, behenic acid, K liquid methyltaurate coconut oil, Centella asiatica extract, Na-2 hyaluronic acid, papain, coix seed extract, dextrin, Glycerin, BG, distearyldimethylammonium hectorite, citric acid, fragrance, potassium hydroxide, methylparaben
data.guide:
Use:

After wetting your hands, take a pea size amount of facewash on the palm of your hand

• Rub it between your palms to create foam

• Wash your face gently with the created foam 

• Rinse thoroughly afterwards

data.name: Rohto HadaLabo Gokujyun Hyaluronic Acid Lotion 170ml
data.short_description:
This Hada Labo Gokujyun fragrance-free lotion contains carefully selected hyaluronic acids, which are highly moisturizing ingredient, aiming to deliver moisture directly into the skin in the simplest form.

This toner works great as a base to layer on multiple layer of skincare, its lightweight texture makes it much easier for the skin to deeply absorb the lotion and perform its function by providing moisture, making it suitable for normal to dry skin.

  • Advanced moisturizing mechanism
  • Lightweight
  • Fragrance free and oil free
  • Contain various types of hyaluronic acid
data.description:
Category: Cosmetics/ Skin care/ Lotion 
 

  • Brand Name: Hada Labo
  • Company: Rohto Pharmaceutical
  • Country of Origin: Japan
  • Quantity: 170ml
  • Reference link:? Amazon USA
  • Reference video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OFc1yatERfA


Ingredient: 
 

  • Water, BG, pentylene glycol, sodium hyaluronate, hydrolyzed hyaluronic acid, sodium acetylated hyaluronate, lactic acid bacteria/hyaluronic acid fermentation liquid, DPG, EDTA-2Na, disodium succinate, succinic acid, phenoxyethanol
data.guide:
How to use:

After cleansing, take a few drops into the palm of your hands.
 

Gently press the lotion into the skin and let it fully absorbed.

data.name: Rohto HadaLabo Gokujun All in one UV White day gel (SPF50 + PA ++++) - 90g
data.short_description:
All in one moisturizer gel.

The Hada Labo UV White Gel performs 7 functions all in one.

The gel contains 3 moisturising agents; hyaluronic acids, nanoized hyaluronic acid and vitamin C derivative, formulated with high SPF 50 PA++++ for the maximum protection against the sun.

It is perfect for morning use with the UV cut function to fight against intense ultraviolet. The lightweight gel can be used as makeup base, moisturiser or beauty serum.

SPF 50 SPA++++

Perform many functions

Lightweight and moisturizing

Fragrance free

data.name: Yanagiya Hair Growth Tonic 240ml
data.short_description: Yanagiya Hair Tonic helps to prevent hair loss and promote hair growth by maintaining a healthy scalp and stimulating the hair follicle.
data.description:
Yanagiya Hair Growth Tonic is formulated with Japanese plant-derived ingredients Swertia Japonica?and?Rabdosia Japonica?which help to promote hair growth and prevent hair loss. 

Ginseng and?Sophora Flavescens?are also blended to promote a strong hair and fight against hair loss. 

Other benefits of this Japanese tonic for hair growth are that it moisturizes the scalp to effectively prevent dandruff and itchiness. 

Has a cooling and refreshing sensation. 

Yanagiya Hair Tonic is a long-selling product in Japan with more than 60 years of history. 

Yanagiya Honten (the manufacturer) was founded in 1615 and has more than 4 centuries of history dealing with raw plant ingredients. 
 

Ingredients-  dipotassium glycyrrhizinate, tocopherol acetate, menthol,  POE hydrogenated castor oil, DPG, assembly extract, carrot extract, clara extract-1, cypress extract-1, fragrance, pH adjuster, ethanol, yellow 4, blue 1. Purified water
data.guide:
Instructions:

Use two or three times a day?on dry hair.

Pour some hair tonic on your palm and rub?it on the scalp by massaging with fingers.

Do not rinse off.

data.name: Roho HadaLabo Shirojyun Whitening Lotion Rich 170ml
data.short_description:
Infused with arbutin (an active brightening ingredient) and various types of hyaluronic acid (a moisturizing ingredient), this lotion restores skin’s moisture and evens skin texture for its smooth and luminescent appearance.

Effectively suppresses melanin production to prevent freckle and sun spot formation to treat sun-damaged skin.

Also contains a Vitamin C derivative, Vitamin E, and coix seed extract to further nourish and brighten skin.

The slightly acidic formula is gentle on the skin.

Made free of fragrance, artificial colorant, mineral oil, and alcohol.
data.description:
Hada-Labo Shirojyun Whitening Lotion Rich is a Japanese watery lotion that targets 
dark spots. 
The moisture-replenishing toner has a rich texture that is ideal for normal to dry skin. It is renewed to 
feature anti-inflammatory tranexamic acid to prevent discoloration while better preventing rough skin 
than the previous formula. Vitamin C derivative, vitamin E, Job's Tears extract, and newly added 
fermented Job's Tears nourish and boost skin's clarity. 2 types of hyaluronic acid deeply hydrate skin. 
It penetrates deeply to replenish moisture while helping to improve skin's clarity for refined, smoother skin 
that is bright and supple. 
 

Ingredients:


Hydrolyzed hyaluronic acid, hyaluronic acid Na-2, Tranexamic acid, vitamin C phosphate Mg, vitamin E, pearl barley fermentation liquid, coix seed extract, BG, DPG, concentrated glycerin, diglycerin, pentylene glycol, sorbitol liquid, edetate, VP Styrene copolymer emulsion, POE (20) , sorbitan laurate, carboxyvinyl polymer, phenoxyethanol
data.guide:
How to use:

After cleansing, take a few drops into the palm of your hands.
 

Gently press the lotion into the skin and let it fully absorbed.
data.only_tags: Hadalabo,Whitening Lotion,Hyperpigmentation,Dullness,Dehydration,Redness,Skin Irritation,uneven skintone,Teen skin,Pregnancy safe,mature skin,Rohto

data.name: MOIST DIANE Extra Damage Repair Treatment (conditioner) 450 ml
data.short_description: Containing high quality organic Argan Oil and Keratin, Moist Diane Perfect Beauty series keeps your hair healthy and shiny. Extra damage treatment repairs your hair with botanical oils, and amino keratin from inside.
data.description:
Repair damage with organic argan oil? and a unique beauty keratin formula. 
"Aminokeratin" intensively repairs damaged hair ends and dryness, leading to moist and manageable hair. 
Extra Damage Repair is a series that focuses on repairing damaged hair. 
Contains organic argan oil , organic sapote oil , organic cactus oil , organic mango oil, and organic andiroba oil 
 

  1. Argania spinosa kernel oil? Moisturizing ingredient
  2. Steardimonium hydroxypropyl hydrolyzed keratin, keratin (wool), isostearoyl hydrolyzed keratin (wool) (repairing ingredient)
  3. Pouteria sapota seed oil (moisturizing ingredient)
  4. Opuntia ficus indica seed oil (moisturizing ingredient)?Ingredients)
  5. Mango seed oil (moisturizing ingredient)
  6. Carapaguaianensis seed oil (moisturizing ingredient)


 

Ingredients:


Water, cetearyl alcohol, dimethicone, γ-docosalactone, quaternium-18, quaternium-33, cholesterol, ceramide EOP, ceramide NG, ceramide NP, ceramide AG, ceramide AP, PG, hydrolyzed keratin (wool/feather), algae Nias Spinosa Kernel Oil, Mango Seed Oil, Theobroma Grandiflorum Seed Oil, Prune Seed Extract, Carapaguaianensis Seed Oil, Sclerocaria Bilea Seed Oil, Baobab Seed Oil, Opuntia Ficus Indica Seed Oil, Steardimonium Hydroxypropyl hydrolyzed keratin, Pouteria sapota seed oil, keratin (wool), isostearoyl hydrolyzed keratin (wool), alanine, hydroxyproline, PCA-Na, cetearamidethyldiethonium hydrolyzed rice protein, sodium hyaluronate, hydroxy hyaluronate Propyltrimonium, hydrolyzed hyaluronic acid, hydrolyzed honey protein, apple fruit culture cell extract, argania spinosa blast extract, rhododendron ferrugineum leaf cell culture extract, collagen, hydrolyzed conchiolin, cyclohexane-1,4-dicarboxylic acid Acid bisethoxydiglycol, castor oil, isomalt, soybean sterol, propanediol, ethylhexyl palmitate, isononyl isononanoate, glucose, BG, dimer dilinoleyl bis(behenyl/isostearyl/phytosteryl) dimer dilinoleate, isostearic acid water Added castor oil, dimethiconol, sodium lactate, hydroxyethylcellulose, xanthan gum, glyceryl trihydrogenated rosinate, lecithin, steartrimonium chloride, cetrimonium chloride, dicocodimonium chloride, behentrimonium chloride, isopropanol, glycerin, lactic acid, tocopherol, EDTA-2Na, phenoxyethanol, fragrance, caramel
data.guide:
How to use:

After shampooing, lightly drain the hair.

Take an appropriate amount and apply it to the entire hair.

After leaving it for a while, rinse well.
